text: Local youths gather here for standardized drills in preparation for conscription.
Practicing strikes and volleys with precision, though battlefield foes are not mere straw targets.
Seasoned soldiers rotate on duty to train new recruits in preparation for war.
The Cathayan military formation is orderly and majestic, with armor gleaming under the sun, poised to strike.
The heroes of the Celestial Empire guard the Dragon Emperor, protecting the lives of its citizens.
Secluded in nature, one may find enlightenment in the mysteries of the winds.
This residence welcomes sages and scholars, recruiting talents from all lands.
Secrets of the stars lie within, while the tower's platform provides a view of celestial movements.
Numerous scholars delve tirelessly into the mysteries of the universe.
Atop the tower lies the Skylight Pavilion, capable of summoning sentinels to survey the world.
Artisans inherit their craft through generations, perfecting intricate skills.
Fireworks illuminate peace while iron and blood forge prosperity.
The art of Southern Gunpowder spreads across Cathay, arming against wolves at the gates.
From precise components to battlefield cannons, Cathayan technicians excel in all.
Gigantic war machines and the deadliest shells are forged amid smoke and thunder.
Elderly fishermen and woodcutters chat over rustic wine by the riverside.
Merchants and cargo ships dock here, making seafood taverns flourish.
Large harbors shelter from storms, attracting merchants with tax reductions.
A world-renowned trading hub, it handles thousands of ships daily and houses naval fleets ready to set sail.
The expansive sea becomes an inland lake when encircled by peninsulas, isles, and lighthouses.
Cathay treasures equestrian skill; nobles often gather for friendly competitions on horseback.
By combining traits from various breeds, this center produces the finest horses in all the land.
Heroic riders receive dedicated courts to refine their martial arts and train steeds.
Awarded fiefs for their valor, lords lead charges in times of war.
The Celestial Emperor’s chosen generals command armies and conquer lands, bearing divine might in mortal forms.
